caption: Encrypt Message
doc: Encrypt a created message using an OpenPGP RSA 4096 public key. If a private key is present also sign the message.

ABa.caption: Signing Date
ABa.doc: Use the supplied date as the signature date, instead of current date.
ABa.name: date

ABx.caption: This action is an endpoint providing data in the element state.
ABx.name: hint
